## TypesettingUtils.getSmallCapsScale() function

Gets the scale applied to a certain character when using the \[\[FontVariant\]\].`SmallCaps`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function getSmallCapsScale(glyphs: GlyphData[], smallCapsTransformations: boolean[], index: number, fontVariant: FontVariant): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  glyphs | [GlyphData](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Array containing \[\[TransformedGlyphData\]\]. |
|  smallCapsTransformations | boolean\[\] |  |
|  index | number | Index to <code>glyphDataArray</code>. |
|  fontVariant | [FontVariant](./harp-text-canvas.fontvariant.md) | Currently active \[\[FontVariant\]\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

Glyph `SmallCaps` scale.
